prompt: Create a map view page with a full-screen map and a compact top app bar. The app bar should have a title 'City Map' in bold black text, a light green background (Colors.green[100]), and a black back arrow icon. Position two floating action buttons: one in the bottom-right corner with a blue GPS icon (Colors.blue) and a white background, and another in the bottom-left corner with a zoom-in icon (Icons.zoom_in) in white and a blue background (Colors.blue). The map area should have a white background with a subtle blue shadow (elevation effect). Use Material Design with a clean and professional look, ensuring the map fills the screen below the app bar.
